alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:28PM CDT until June 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTY... At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters 5 miles northeast of Morganville at 721 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Clay Center, Morganville and Green. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
